text: Patrik Polívka (born March 4, 1994) is a Czech professional ice hockey goalie. He is currently playing for HC Plzeň of the Czech Extraliga. Polívka made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Plzeň during the 2014-15 Czech Extraliga season where he stopped 21 of the 25 shots he faced. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:HC Plzeň players Category:Czech ice hockey goaltenders Category:Competitors at the 2015 Winter Universiade
title: Patrik Polívka
